1419010.name: My Very Own Light Demo
1419010.description:
Enter an uncommon game with a world made of puzzles and try to leave the disturbing realm where you awake amnesiac with half of your brain in a strange lantern.

Learn to part ways with your significant other in this 30-hours Gothic adventure to unravel the mysteries of your past and of this place.

There you will discover the fauna of the castle which dominates the place and face its hostile members in turn-based combats that emphasizes observation and deduction.
Also you'll meet its intriguing hosts who will ask for your help, but will they all be trustworthy?


  • Overcome increasingly original puzzles going through sokobans, lasers, currents, water levels, electricity etc. in a non linear progression
  • Cross 31 thoroughly designed intertwined levels ranging from the Clock Tower to the Occult Chambers passing by the Wing of the Courtesans and other Suspended Greenhouses or Small Opera.
  • Enjoy a dark, angular style and a discreet humor punctuated with irony and innuendo.
  • And live the adventure with friend, if you wish, by sharing William and his precious lantern.
1419010.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
